name: Neural Re-Sync
description: A vial of clear fluid that reboots neural pathways after overloading from intense data streams or extended immersion in virtual realities. It tastes faintly like copper and ozone.

attributes.effect: Heals 50 HP per use for up to 3 seconds

flavor.rationale: Players often experience mental fatigue after heavy VR use, hacking attempts, or receiving a large influx of information. This consumable offers temporary relief while their brains recover.
